result.markdown:
--- title: "Data documentation" page-layout: full toc: false sidebar: false execute: echo: false bibliography: ../hss8005.bib css: ../html/nobiblio.css --- The datasets listed in the table below can be read into `R` from `"https://cgmoreh.github.io/HSS8005-data/___"` (using a type-appropriate read function and replacing \_\_\_ with "File name" and "Type" extension; e.g. `dataset <- haven::read_dta("https://cgmoreh.github.io/HSS8005-data/dataset.dta")`). ::: {.cell} ::: ::: text-xm
File name Type Description Link to source
[evs5](https://cgmoreh.github.io/HSS8005-data/evs5.sav) .sav European Values Study; Wave 5 (2017-2021) [Source](https://search.gesis.org/research_data/ZA7500)
[osterman](https://cgmoreh.github.io/HSS8005-data/osterman.dta) .dta Replication data for @Osterman2021CanWeTrustEducationFostering, based on European Social Survey Rounds 1-9 data [Source](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=doi:10.7910/DVN/RCSCDA)
[LaddLenz](https://cgmoreh.github.io/HSS8005-data/LaddLenz.dta) .dta Replication data for @LaddLenz2009ExploitingRareCommunicationShiftDocument, based on British Election Panel Study data. Included in @Hainmueller2012EntropyBalancingCausalEffectsMultivariate [Source](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataset.xhtml?persistentId=hdl:1902.1/16077)
[EverydayTrust](https://cgmoreh.github.io/HSS8005-data/EverydayTrust.Rds) .Rds Replication data for @WeissEtAl2021TrustEverydayLife [Source](https://osf.io/kwp6n/)
[galtonpeas](https://cgmoreh.github.io/HSS8005-data/galtonpeas.Rds) .Rds Data underpinning a paper presented by Sir Francis Galton to the Royal Institute on February 9, 1877, summarising his experiments on sweet peas in which he compared the size of peas produced by parent plants to those produced by offspring plants. [Source](https://rdrr.io/rforge/alr4/man/galtonpeas.html)
[galton1886](https://cgmoreh.github.io/HSS8005-data/galton1886.dta) .dta Sir Francis Galton's famous data on the heights or parents and their children underpinning his 1886 paper [@Galton1886RegressionMediocrityHereditaryStature]. [Source and more info](http://www.medicine.mcgill.ca/epidemiology/hanley/galton/)
:::
